features: 【Upgrade Your Building Experience】We've made some improvements to our building blocks to provide a better experience for your child. Our blocks are now larger, smoother, and burr-free, making them safer and more aesthetically pleasing. The upgraded structure ensures that the blocks fit together more securely, allowing your child to can easily building exciting and more solid 3D structures within minutes.

【Excellent Value with Large Quantity】: 960pcs large number of building blocks entertain your child for hours with this versatile and creative toy. Suitable for all ages, it's a great way to spend quality time with kids and family. It's perfect for playing in classroom, outdoors, indoors. also different colors building blocks allow Your child to build more models, such as castles, robots, cars, butterfly, flowers and more.

【Safe and Sturdy】: With a storage bag, you can easily put the toys into the bag to avoid losing. Made of non-toxic plastic, the KODATEK building block set is ASTM US compliant, ensuring that it is free from BPA, lead, heavy metal, and phthalates and meets all necessary safety regulations.

【Fun and Educational STEM Toys】: Encourage your child's creativity with this colorful building block set. It helps to cultivate spatial relationships, 3D spatial imagination, and eye-hand coordination. This building block set promotes STEM education, which is essential for success in today's ever-changing environment.

【Ideal Gift for Boys and Girls】: Our building block set is perfect for children of all ages, making it an ideal gift for birthdays, Christmas, or any special occasion. This toy will never go out of style and will provide your child with years of entertainment and learning opportunities, Order yours now and give your kids an activity they'll love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids and adults alike love it!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this toy for my little cousin for Christmas. He’s a very creative and curious, child. The designs are not difficult to build and the pieces are sturdy yet easily assembled. They are a bit bendy and make building super easy for the little ones! The pieces are quite small! So, personally I don’t recommend them for little ones under 4 years old. Within minutes he’d built the giraffe and the tree. He’s currently working on the tank! Lovely for creative children, and his older brother whose 12 even liked playing with them! Fun for all ages!! If you’re considering buying, go for it!! It came in neat and organized packaging. Everything was clean and ready to play!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hours of fun for kids. Feels like high quality and smooth. It's easy to clean, maintenance, and assemble. Fits fine and colorful enough pretty entertaining for many children's. It's great for kids to play together and highly giftable. Comes with a storage bag. Small enough for detailing. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good toy fir creative minds
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughters loved this set. It comes with a lot of pieces and you can create some really cool things

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As a parent, I'm impressed by its educational value and how it sparks my child's creativity. The variety in shapes and colors not only keeps my little one engaged for hours but also enhances their motor skills and problem-solving abilities. The quality is fantastic, sturdy enough for endless imaginative creations. It's been a wonderful addition to our playtime routine and a fantastic way to encourage STEM learning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Different Type of Building
reviews.reviewText: My 8-year-old loves building with all styles of blocks (we have Legos, Lincoln logs, magnetic blocks, Picasso tiles, interlocking blocks, you name it we probably have it) When I saw these, I thought they looked really different and might challenge my son to think about more round builds. Of course, he uses all his blocks together, and these are well used. They are not for little ones who still put things in their mouths as they are small. They can also be challenging, since there are no base pieces, you have to build and sometimes hold what you are working on. But they are nicely made, and you get a lot of pieces. They don't match Legos as far as blocks go, but they are an interesting addition if you have a builder!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best thing since Legos
reviews.reviewText: Ok these little blocks are tiny but mighty. I bought these as a travel toy since we were away from home for a while. They have provided so much entertainment for my kids. The kids have surprised me with what they have built using these blocks. Anyone that has come over and seen them or their kids have played with them ask for the link to buy. The amount of creativity that goes into each of my kids builds is amazing. I love these blocks and so happy I purchased them. We still love Legos but who doesn't like to switch it up sometimes and try something new. Comes with a zippered bag which will come in handy when we finally leave to go home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They are ok, for a child's first building toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the kids love it
reviews.reviewText: it is real small pieces so need to keep an eye but the kids love it and building big stuff with it
